sen.j: 精進落とし（しょうじんおとし）とは、もともと中陰の忌明けに精進料理から通常の食事に戻すこと。
sen.e: Shojin Otoshi originally referred to shifting from maigre meals back to normal meals after chuin (a period of mourning lasting seven weeks) is over.
Shojin Otoshi originally referred to shifting from maigre meals back to normal meals after the completion of chuin (a period of mourning lasting seven weeks).

sen.e: Today, however, Shojin Otoshi is held at a banquet in a memorial service on the sixth day after a person's death, after returning from the crematory to reward the priest and facilitators for their services.
